summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 TOYOTA COROLLA.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS PARKED ON AN INCLINE WITH THE BRAKE PEDAL ENGAGED BUT IT FAILED TO RESPOND AND THE VEHICLE ROLLED DOWN THE DRIVEWAY AND CRASH INTO THE CURB. THE LOCAL DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WHERE MINOR AUTO BODY REPAIRS WERE COMPLETED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED.  THE DRIVER SUSTAINED BRUISING AND SWELLING TO THE LEG AND KNEE BUT DID NOT RECEIVE MEDICAL ATTENTION. A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED WITH CORAOPOLIS POLICE DEPARTMENT. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 153,000. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE.
